NK037(ji)018:1: // rnam sras nang sgrub mdung dmar can rtsa sgrub rta
NK037(ji)018:2: sngon ma'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa bzhugs
NK037(ji)018:4: ngal gsos rgyal po chen po ni //
NK037(ji)018:5: dbang gi las mdzad der btud nas //
NK037(ji)018:6: sgrub thabs rjes gnang cho ga yis //
NK037(ji)018:7: snying po mdo tsam bri bar bya //
NK037(ji)018:8: 'dir rnam thos sras mdung dmar can rta sngon gyi
NK037(ji)018:9: sgrub thabs dang 'brel bar rjes gnang sgrub pa la
NK037(ji)018:10: gsum ste / sbyor ba yo byad kyi gshom /
NK037(ji)018:11: dngos gzhi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK037(ji)018:13: dang po yo byad bsham pa ni /
NK037(ji)018:14: stegs bu dri bzang dang sin+d+h+au ras byugs pa la /
NK037(ji)018:15: man+dala sgom don dang mthun pa rdul tshon dang ras bris la brten pa'am /
NK037(ji)018:16: bsdu na pad ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du /
NK037(ji)018:17: gtor ma gru gsum 'khor can la ba dan dmar po sku gzugs kyis brgyan pa btsugs /
NK037(ji)018:18: mtha' skor gyi shar du spos dang dri chu'i dung zhal /
NK037(ji)018:20: lhor rgya phor ram dngul phor du chang phud /
NK037(ji)018:22: nub tu 'bru sna tshogs kyi me tog /
NK037(ji)018:24: byang du 'bul gtor sha sogs bza' bcas brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)018:25: byang shar du bshos bu gru gsum ra dmar khrag gis byugs pa rnams bsham /
NK037(ji)018:26: gzhan yang rdor dril rol mo sogs mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad tshogs par bsham mo //
NK037(ji)018:27: gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs ni /
NK037(ji)018:30: gsang ba'i bdag po'i bdag bskyed sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)018:32: stong pa'i ngang las e yam ram lam sum las
NK037(ji)018:33: 'byung bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa'i rtser b+h+r+aum las
NK037(ji)018:34: gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs dang
NK037(ji)018:35: bcas pa / rdo rje'i sa gzhi la gnas shing ra bas bskor ba /
NK037(ji)018:36: mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)018:37: nang gi lha snam phyogs kyi mdog can du gnas
NK037(ji)018:38: pa'i dbus su 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs bzhi pa'i
NK037(ji)018:39: lte bar sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la
NK037(ji)018:40: gnas pa'i rta sngo nag nyams rtsal dang ldan pa
NK037(ji)018:41: gser gyi sga dang rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan
NK037(ji)018:42: pa / de'i steng du bee dmar po'i 'phro 'du
NK037(ji)018:43: las rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras sku mdog
NK037(ji)018:44: dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK037(ji)018:45: spyan gnyis dmar la zlum pa /
NK037(ji)018:46: zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa /
NK037(ji)018:47: smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser 'bar ba /
NK037(ji)018:49: g.yon gter gyi ne'u le 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)018:50: dar sna tshogs kyi na bza' dang bse khrab gsol ba /
NK037(ji)018:52: dbu la rmog zhu dang zhabs la bse'i lo khram gsol ba /
NK037(ji)018:53: khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
NK037(ji)018:54: 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la shar du sha las r+aa
NK037(ji)018:55: hu la mgo dgu'i steng na bya rog gi zhal
NK037(ji)018:56: can / smug nag lus kun mig gis gang zhing ro smad sbrul du 'khyil ba /
NK037(ji)018:57: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang sbrul zhags 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)018:58: lhor ra las gnod sbyin d+ha na ser nag rtse gsum thod khrag /
NK037(ji)018:59: nub tu ma las kwa la nag mo be con thod khrag /
NK037(ji)018:60: byang du na las ku be ra ljang nag dbyug tho dang thod khrag /
NK037(ji)018:61: phyi rol lha snam gyi phyogs bzhir shar du sha las bum sna dmar ljang g.yas rgyal mtshan /
NK037(ji)018:62: lhor sam las dung sna ser ljang g.yas rgyal mtshan /
NK037(ji)018:63: nub tu ham las sna gsum ljang nag g.yas mdung dmar /
NK037(ji)018:64: byang du am las sna chen dkar ljang g.yas dbyug tho /
NK037(ji)018:65: de bdun ka sbom thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs can dar
NK037(ji)018:66: dang rin po che'i rgyan can g.yo ne'u le thogs
NK037(ji)018:67: pa'o // shar sgor dzahls lcags kyu ma dkar mo //
NK037(ji)018:68: lho sgor h'u las zhags pa ma ser mo /
NK037(ji)018:69: nub sgor bam las lcags sgrog ma dmar mo /
NK037(ji)018:70: byang sgor hohls dril bu ma ljang gu bzhi ka'ang 'dzum khro dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)018:71: phyi'i khor yug la gnod sbyin bye ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o //
NK037(ji)018:73: rang nyid gsang ba'i bdag po'i thugs ka'i h'u gi
NK037(ji)018:74: 'od zer las khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po byung
NK037(ji)018:75: / rgyal po 'khor bcas spyan drangs par bsam /
NK037(ji)018:78: ri rab lhun po'i byang phyogs nas //
NK037(ji)018:79: gnod sbyin rgyal po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)018:80: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas //
NK037(ji)018:81: thugs dam dbang gis gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)018:82: ma h+aa yak+sha r+aa dza bee sh+ra ma na ya
NK037(ji)018:83: sa m+aa dzah dzahmh'u bam hoh bee sh+ra ma na
NK037(ji)018:84: +aa kar+sha ya dzah zhes pas spyan drangs /
NK037(ji)018:85: rat+na mu ku ta a b+hi shiny+tsa mi /
NK037(ji)018:86: zhes cod pan gyis dbang bskur /
NK037(ji)018:88: ri rab chen po'i gzhal yas 'dir //
NK037(ji)018:89: nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan khri la //
NK037(ji)018:90: gnod sbyin rgyal po 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)018:91: bstan pa bsrung phyir bzhugs su gsol //
NK037(ji)018:94: gsang bdag gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)018:95: dam tshig can gyi lha tshogs la //
NK037(ji)018:96: gnyis med dang ba'i tshul gyis ni //
NK037(ji)018:97: rtse gcig gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK037(ji)018:98: a ti p+au hoh pra t+aits+tsha hohn mah zhes pas phyag bya /
NK037(ji)018:100: gsang bdag gnod sbyin chen po 'khor bcas la //
NK037(ji)018:101: spos dang me tog mar me zhal zas dang //
NK037(ji)018:102: sil snyan rnga chen byug pa mchod pa'i sprin //
NK037(ji)018:103: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis sprul pas mchod //
NK037(ji)018:104: badz+ra ar+g+ham nas shap+da'i bar dang /
NK037(ji)018:105: p+au dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye h'u /
NK037(ji)018:109: ri rab lhun po'i byang phyogs nas //
NK037(ji)018:110: rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)018:111: gling bzhi'i byang phyogs skyong tsa na //
NK037(ji)018:112: in+d+ra n+ai la'i mdog dang ldan //
NK037(ji)018:113: sa brgyad sems dpar bzhugs pa po //
NK037(ji)018:114: gnod sbyin pho mo mang po dang //
NK037(ji)018:115: klu yi sde dpon mdzad tsa na //
NK037(ji)018:116: rin chen gser gyi kha dog dang //
NK037(ji)018:117: mkha' 'gro ma dang glu mo dang //
NK037(ji)018:118: bdud mo'i sde dpon mdzad tsa na //
NK037(ji)018:119: beed+aura mthing ga'i sku mdog can //
NK037(ji)018:120: gsang ba'i gnad nas bskul tsan //
NK037(ji)018:122: mi'u thung bzhengs pa'i cha lugs la //
NK037(ji)018:123: le brgan dar gyi cod pan can //
NK037(ji)018:124: sku la bse khrab dmar po gsol //
NK037(ji)018:125: phyag g.yas mdung dmar rgyal mtshan thogs //
NK037(ji)018:126: g.yon pa ne'u le lcags kyu 'dzin //
NK037(ji)018:127: 'gro ba'i rnam shes dbang du sdud //
NK037(ji)018:129: srid pa gsum yang dbang du sdud //
NK037(ji)018:131: sbyin bdag rnams kyi lag pa sgul //
NK037(ji)018:132: bdag la zas nor dngos grub stsol //
NK037(ji)018:133: khyed kyi sprul pa'i rgyal phran rnams //
NK037(ji)018:134: 'gro ba rnams kyi snying du zhugs //
NK037(ji)018:135: rnam shes sgyur la dbang du sdus //
NK037(ji)018:136: sgrub pa po la dngos grub stsol //
NK037(ji)018:139: rgyal po 'khor bcas kyi thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i bee yig sngags kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)018:140: bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od kyis bskul bas ci 'dod
NK037(ji)018:141: pa'i phrin las thogs med du sgrub par bsams la
NK037(ji)018:142: / ma h+aa r+aa dza yak+sha sa ma ya bee
NK037(ji)018:143: sh+ra ma na ye sarba tsit+ta rat+na hrim hrim dzahdzah
NK037(ji)018:146: rlung me thod pa'i sgyed bu la gnas pa'i a
NK037(ji)018:147: las ka p+aa lar bcud sha lnga bdud rtsi lngar
NK037(ji)018:148: gnas pa la / rang gi snying ga'i 'od kyis
NK037(ji)018:149: gnod byed thams cad bkug ste thim pa'i sha khrag
NK037(ji)018:150: gi gtor ma 'dod yon gyi phung por bsam la
NK037(ji)018:153: a k+aa ro sogs kyis byin gyis brlab /
NK037(ji)018:154: bee sh+ra ma na sa pa ri b+aa ra ma
NK037(ji)018:155: h+aa ba lim ta ma h+aa p+au dza kha kha
NK037(ji)018:157: zhes pa bdun gyis phul la /
NK037(ji)018:159: rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang na //
NK037(ji)018:160: khams gsum dbang du byed pa'i lha //
NK037(ji)018:161: rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)018:163: byang phyogs rgyal po rnam thos sras //
NK037(ji)018:164: sras dang blon po sgo ma dang //
NK037(ji)018:165: gnod sbyin bye ba'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK037(ji)018:166: 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kun //
NK037(ji)018:167: mchod sbyin gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK037(ji)018:168: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK037(ji)018:169: bu sdug bzhin du bskyang ba dang //
NK037(ji)018:170: tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par mdzod //
NK037(ji)018:171: gzhan yang bdag cag 'khor bcas la //
NK037(ji)018:172: log par zhugs pa'i dgra dang bgegs //
NK037(ji)018:173: de yi phru ma gzhom pa dang //
NK037(ji)018:174: gtan nas brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod //
NK037(ji)018:175: de ltar bcom ba'i las 'di dag /
NK037(ji)018:176: dam tshig ldan pa khyed rnams kyis //
NK037(ji)018:177: sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs la //
NK037(ji)018:178: ma g.yel da lta 'grub par mdzod //
NK037(ji)018:180: rjes chog ni ser chen gyi skabs dang 'dra'o //
NK037(ji)018:181: gsum pa rjes gnang gi cho ga ni /
NK037(ji)018:182: sgrub mchod bshad ma thag pa ltar byas nas /
NK037(ji)018:186: yang gsang mkha' 'gro ltar sgrub pa ste bzhi las
NK037(ji)018:187: zhes pa yan chad ser chen gyi skabs ltar las
NK037(ji)018:188: / 'di nyid grags tshod gsang sgrub yin pa ltar snang yang /
NK037(ji)018:189: don du mdung dmar can rtsa sgrub rta sngon ma 'di nyid nang sgrub yin par nges shing /
NK037(ji)018:190: gang ltar de lta bu'i rnam thos sras kyi man
NK037(ji)018:191: ngag zab mo rnams phyi rabs kyi don du gter
NK037(ji)018:192: du sbas pa gnyal pa nyi ma shes rab kyis
NK037(ji)018:193: bton nas dam pa du ma las rim bzhin brgyud
NK037(ji)018:194: pa'i rjes gnang zab mo sgrub pa la slob dpon
NK037(ji)018:195: gyi bya ba rnams sngon du song /
NK037(ji)018:196: slob ma'i bya ba man+dala phul /
NK037(ji)018:197: gsol ba gdab pa thugs rje chen po'i gter mnga' ba //
NK037(ji)018:198: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)018:199: bdag sogs dbul phongs skyob pa'i phyir //
NK037(ji)018:200: gter chen sgrub pa bdag la stsol //
NK037(ji)018:202: rgyal chen rnam mang thos sras ni //
NK037(ji)018:203: khyod kyis brtson par mchod nus sam //
NK037(ji)018:204: phrin las bcol dang dam tshig rnams //
NK037(ji)018:205: rjes su mthun par byed nus sam //
NK037(ji)018:207: gtso bos ji ltar sogs kyis khas blang /
NK037(ji)018:208: rgyun bshags nas mdun bskyed mchod bstod kyi bar ser chen dang 'dra ba las /
NK037(ji)018:209: lcags kyi rdo rje spyi bor bzhag ste /
NK037(ji)018:210: 'di ni ye shes rdo rje ste //
NK037(ji)018:211: sangs rgyas thams cad kun gyi bdag /
NK037(ji)018:212: dregs pa spyi yi gnyen po mchog /
NK037(ji)018:213: khyod la bdag gis deng 'dir bskur //
NK037(ji)018:214: ma h+aa a b+hi shiny+tsa tu m+aam +aahmh'u s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)018:215: zhes dregs pa spyi 'dul gyi rjes gnang ngo //
NK037(ji)018:216: slob ma phyag rdor du gsal ba'i snying gar gtor ma bzhag ste /
NK037(ji)018:217: gtor ma'i lha las rgyal chen gnyis pa zhig chad /
NK037(ji)018:218: slob ma'i snying gar thim lus dang grib ma'i tshul du bzhugs par mos /
NK037(ji)018:219: bee r+aa dza sa ma ya sid+d+hi dzahmh'u bam hoh 'di ni rgyal po chen po ste //
NK037(ji)018:220: khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i lha //
NK037(ji)018:221: dngos grub ma lus kun stsol ba //
NK037(ji)018:222: khyod la de ring bskur thob shog /
NK037(ji)018:224: w+aa ka sid+d+hi +aah tsit+ta sid+d+hi h'u /
NK037(ji)018:226: bla ma brgyud pa'i mtshan nas brjod de bka' bsgo
NK037(ji)018:227: skabs su gang babs bya ste sku dngos kyi rjes
NK037(ji)018:228: gnang ngo // mdung dmar gtad la /
NK037(ji)018:229: 'di ni dbang gi mdung dmar te //
NK037(ji)018:230: tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par byed //
NK037(ji)018:231: 'gro ba thams cad dbang du sdud //
NK037(ji)018:232: dbang gi las kyi dbang bskur byin //
NK037(ji)018:233: bee r+aa dza ma ma dung dung phata /
NK037(ji)018:234: dbang gi las kyi rjes gnang ngo //
NK037(ji)018:235: dung phor gyi dri bzang lce la bzhag ste gtor cung zad kyang byin la /
NK037(ji)018:236: bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dam pa yis //
NK037(ji)018:237: zas nor longs spyod char ltar 'bebs //
NK037(ji)018:238: 'jig rten gsum gyi bcud thams cad //
NK037(ji)018:239: bdud rtsir bsgyur nas gtad cing bskur //
NK037(ji)018:240: pany+tsa a mri ta sid+d+hi h'u h'u /
NK037(ji)018:241: dngos grub kyi rjes gnang ngo //
NK037(ji)018:242: rta sha dang mi sha mi za //
NK037(ji)018:244: snod kha chag tu mi za /
NK037(ji)018:245: yugs sa mo'i zas mi za /
NK037(ji)018:248: gos nag mi gyon pa sogs spang bya dang /
NK037(ji)018:249: lung thang gi phreng ba bzung /
NK037(ji)018:251: phyi rten rta sngon dngos sam bris pa dang /
NK037(ji)018:253: gsang rten gtor ma ma chag pa ste bsgrub bya'i dam tshig rnams bsgrag cing khas blang ngo //
NK037(ji)018:254: man+dala 'bul ba sogs dang mdun bskyed kyi rjes chog kyang sngar dang 'dra'o //
NK037(ji)018:255: mi 'gyur tshe dang ye shes mthu //
NK037(ji)018:256: thogs med sgrub byed rdo rje'i rigs //
NK037(ji)018:257: rgyal chen sgrub thab snying po'i mchog /
NK037(ji)018:259: rgyal chen nang sgrub mdung dmar can rtsa sgrub rta
NK037(ji)018:260: sngon ma'i sgrub thabs rjes gnang dang bcas pa'i le'u
NK037(ji)018:261: tshan gter chen 'gyur med rdo rje'i gsung sgrub thabs
